Basics · 11 · 2024-11-08

Japanese uses three writing systems: hiragana, katakana, and kanji.

Hiragana is used for native Japanese words and grammatical elements.

HiraganaRomajiEnglish
あaa
いii
うuu

Greetings · 8 · 2024-11-08

Japanese greetings vary by time of day and formality level.

  • おはようございます (ohayou gozaimasu) - Good morning (formal)
  • こんにちは (konnichiwa) - Hello/Good afternoon
  • こんばんは (konbanwa) - Good evening
